alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 11:26AM CST until January 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until noon CST. * At 1125 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ozark, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Barefield Crossroads, Bells Crossroads, Browns Crossroads, Clopton, Skipperville, Echo, Edwin, Ward Bridge, Bertha, Mabson and Snells Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
